akn:section.akn:heading: Signing and filing pursuant to judicial order.

akn:content.akn:p: If a person required by this chapter to sign a record or deliver a record to the Mayor for filing under this chapter does not do so, any other person that is aggrieved may petition the Superior Court to order:

If a petitioner under subsection (a) of this section is not the partnership or foreign limited liability partnership to which the record pertains, the petitioner shall make the partnership a party to the action.
A record filed under subsection (a)(3) of this section is effective without being signed.
